quest.name: Using Their Heads
journal:
The Grebuloffs wish to look their best, and Stigma-4 requires your eye for aesthetics.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested materials to Stigma-4.
objectives: Mine [Error] from Ostrakon Deka-okto.Deliver [Error] to Stigma-4.Gather [Error] from Ostrakon Deka-okto.Catch [Error] from Ostrakon Tria.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Request from Grebuloffs pending. Materials petitioned for maintenance and aesthetic upgrade of diving helmets.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Stipulation: materials must be procured from outside Elysion. After analyzing desired parameters, materials with at least 90% satisfaction quotient have been located.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Please procure weighted agalmatolite from Ostrakon Deka-okto. Approximate coordinates: 11, 27, 0.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Please procure fragrant greens from Ostrakon Deka-okto. Approximate coordinates: 9, 27, 0.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text:
Please procure a fish known as sticky fingers from Ostrakon Tria. Approximate coordinates: 22, 8, 2.
Use of gold salmon roe is strongly advised. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Expedient delivery of materials will ensure optimization of Grebuloff satisfaction quotient.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Awaiting delivery of weighted agalmatolite from Ostrakon Deka-okto.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Awaiting delivery of fragrant greens from Ostrakon Deka-okto.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Awaiting delivery of sticky fingers from Ostrakon Tria. Use of gold salmon roe is strongly advised. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of Forename confirmed. Ready to accept petitioned materials.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analyzing... Materials identified as weighted agalmatolitefragrant greenssticky fingers. The Grebuloffs will be pleased.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Historical records indicate that helmet adornment protocols are a source of particular pride among Grebuloffs.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: The incorporation of foreign materials into helmets is believed to promote amicable relations with denizens of affiliated territories.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: This practice is illogical and an inefficient use of time and material. However, its impact upon the goodwill of foreign parties cannot be conclusively dismissed as insignificant. Future comprehensive evaluation of relations deemed necessary.
